EmailTemplate.description: HTML general template for The Challenge Society
EmailTemplate.name: CATs Launch Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Exclusive CAT Launch - We want you there!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Challenge Network / Society
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Hello from The Challenge Society!
At graduation you showed an interest in volunteering and we have the perfect opportunity for you to do something amazing in your community, make new friends and gain great skills - form a Challenge Action Team!
You are invited to the exclusive Challenge Action Team (CAT) launch. Come if you have an idea or just want to find out more. As a bonus there is free PIZZA and Christmas cheer!
Text 'YES' and your full name to 07837774444!
Wednesday 19th December, Custard Factory Reception,6 - 8pm.
WWW.THE-CHALLENGE.ORG/GRADUATES /thechallengesociety
The Challenge Network Ltd is registered in England and Wales, no 6845451. Registered charity no. 1129239. Registered address: 75 Westminster Bridge Road, London SE1 7HS
